column4: I'm building the binutils package from the package source on Breezy,
and notice binutils-2.16.1 has a gcc build-dep.  Could this build-dep
not be on c-compiler instead?  I already had gcc-3.4 installed; would
that not have been sufficient?  Should I submit a bug report?
